text: My sister tried to hurt kill herselfI picked up my sister to take her to work  half way there she shut down and said she didn t want to go to work she wanted me to take her to work  Since I work in the same city as her  min away  I told her that I still need to work and she could stay at my office until I finished  For   she was ok then she texted me constantly to take her home  When I asked her to tell me what s wrong  she wouldn t   min later she walked out of my office to the common area where the washrooms are  I followed her to see if she was ok  She kept yelling at me to leave her alone but to take her  An argument ensued about how I needed to work and i left back to the office  I called my dad to tell him to pick her up or to call her to calm her down  I went back to find her and when I walked into the washroom she had locked herself in a stall  and she had knotted her sweater to the top rail of the stall  I tried to open the door but she was crying and wouldn t  I looked over the door and she had a black plastic knife and the sweater around her neck  I tried to get the thing from her neck and I climbed over the stall her neck was red and her face was red she had marks on her arms and chest  She blames me that I didn t take her home  I took her to the hospital and they released her told her to take counciling   I was so afraid I didn t know what to do  I m so exhausted  I realize why they say suicide  suicide attempts are selfish but I never thought I d have to go through this  I can t have her in my life anymore  I m so emotionally drained I can t deal with it
summary: My sister tried to kill herself. She locked herself in a bathroom and stabbed herself with a knife and sweater around her neck. She was taken to the hospital and told to take counciling. She blames her brother for not taking her home.

text: Why should I have to suffer When someone is terminally ill and they pass away it s devastating and seen as a great tragedy  However we often hear  at least now they aren t suffering  I get it  Mental illness can be treated  For most it will always be there  but it can be managed  So far I haven t found a way to treat it  or manage it   So why should I suffer with this mental prison in my brain  Every day is agony  I m on medication  I ve been through countless therapists and sessions  I just want to die and not have to suffer anymore   I just love my family too darn much to do it  I know they re not being selfish for wanting me to stay alive since they love me and care for me  But gosh  sometimes it feels that way  I m here just for them because their lives would be gutted  but each moment is complete agony  I rarely feel happiness and joy  I can t work or engage socially  I m just wilting away in my home waiting to succumb to death  So why do I have to suffer to appease others   Does anyone else feel this way

text: All the reasons to kill myself  I m always tired and I can t stand it  I m lazy  I m ungrateful for what I have  I don t care about people as much as I should  No one likes me  romantically or otherwise   I ll never really amount to anything   I m a burden   I m a huge waste of money and space  I get angry too easily   All I do is sleep all day  The heaviness in my chest will never go away  I don t feel real or alive  I m a bad friend  People would be better off without me  No one would really care  I m disposable and easy to forget  I ll never really have someone who cares about me  I can t do anything right  I m an idiot  I m ruining other people s lives by existing   I m probably a phony who s just really good at lying to myself and not actually as sad as I think I am  I ll never feel good enough   I m a coward  It s never going to get better  I waste peoples time  I m hopeless    I can t even cry properly anymore   If I m not sad I m empty   Sometimes I just want to rip my heart straight out of my chest  I m useless and unhelpful   I either kill myself now or end up in a ditch somewhere because of sheer incompetence and helplessness   I really want to die before I end up being more of a disappointment   Dying will finally give me peace of mind

text: I m done with livingI think I have come to the realisation that I m just done with life and done with being alive  I don t feel hopeless and I don t feel that kind of despair that used to come with my suicidal thoughts anymore  It irritates me  because most people who want to commit suicide are in intense emotional distress  For me it s actually the opposite  I don t feel fear anymore  I m not scared of death or dying anymore  In fact  I feel relief  I feel relief because now I finally don t want to live anymore and I m not scared of dying  so there is really nothing holding me back anymore
